short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A glowing volcanic eruption at sunset.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brings a fresh experience to your browser's new tab with a breathtaking background featuring a solitary cherry blossom tree glowing atop a cliff, overlooking vivid red lava flows intertwined with misty clouds under a golden sunset. This extension not only enhances visual aesthetics but also includes practical features like real-time time display and weather updates, making your daily browsing both relaxing and convenient.
